page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: Some farms are mostly grass.Turnips and sugar beet are also grown.There are many things about farming that recur every year like harvest,seed- time,lambing,dipping etc.The ground must be fertilized regularly to keep it in good condition.Some crops,such as potatoes, have to be irrigated when the weather is dry.Insecticides are used and also fungicides to keep the crops free from pests and diseases. There are no pig farms in the area. There are no dairy herds either.There are some small areas of woodland which are used for timber,Christmas trees and cover for wild life.Lots of farm machinery is used.{Goughs}of{ {Hunsingore }sell and repair it.There is a {hunt}every year where fox hounds hunt for foxes.People on horses follow the hounds.The hunt meets at{Clock {Farm.}It is the York and Ainsty Hunt.
